title: Is MOFF GIDEON SNOKE!? Dr. Pershing's Experiments Explained! The Mandalorian Chapter 12
author: Think Story
description:
In this theory video we look at The Mandalorian Season 2 Episode 4 (Chapter 12) and new clues that hint at Moff Gideon and Snoke as well as Dr. Pershing's experiments on baby yoda.
